phrases: You guys did a great job.
It is all thanks to me and Miuna.
It was a lot more fun than I thought it would be.
Do you want Gori Gori-kun pops or Homebase Bars?
Er, Sensei, it is too cold for popsicles today.
But sadly, they do not sell meat buns this time of year.
I want to do the Ofunehiki...
They have totally got the hots for each other.
Now, now, trying to play it off.
I wonder how far they have gone.
That hurt a lot more than I thought it would...
Well, we are going to do it in a sense...
No, I do not mean that...
But what you taught us in class that they used to do.
With the sea and the surface working together...
Hey, that sounds like a great idea!
Since we went through all the trouble, it would be nice to see a real Ofunehiki.
But we would not be able to do it without help from Shioshishio...
so it would be a little hard.
But if we are going to do it, we want to do it right.
Yeah, since we came this far.
Shioshishio village and the Oshiooshi fishery cooperative have,
they are saying there will not be one this year.
We went through all this trouble making it...
I will do something about Shishio.
Tsumugu, you be the leader and do something about Oshiooshi.
You say that, but I think it would be pretty hard...
I do not like doing things only halfway.
Even if it is hopeless, I want to at least try everything we can do to finish with no regrets.
I will help out as well.
Let us all do our best!
I will make sure that the Ofunehiki happens.
The thing that you and Tsumugu wished for...
Association to Make the Ofunehiki a Reality
Let us make the Ofunehiki a reality again this year!
Please help us get enough signatures!
All right, we are not going to lose!
Let us make the Ofunehiki a reality this year!
You are going to scare people off doing that!
We are trying to do the Ofunehiki!
We are Hama Junior High's Association to Make the Ofunehiki a Reality.
I heard they were not going to do it this year.
we plan on doing something even bigger than last year!
Can you middle schoolers manage it by yourselves?
Guess I do not have a choice.
Why is he so serious about this?
I think he probably wants to get rid of his frustrations so he is going all out.
To think that Hikari has such a competitive side...
W-Well, if it is just for a moment...
I need to try hard, too.
I do not think that really suits you.
Is that really the point here?
I mean... everyone can only do what they can.
If you try hard at something you cannot do, it only hurts in the end.
You are all really going at it.
Akari-san, thank you for talking to the manager for us.
Not to mention Sayama-kun, the manager's son, is helping out, too.
And I would like to see it, too...
Then, could you display these in the store?
Give me some of those forms, too.
I will get you some signatures.
I will hand them out to people I know.
I mean, having the people of the surface and sea hand in hand...
It sort of hits pretty close to home.
I want to do the Ofunehiki.
I am going to make it happen.
You can at least talk to the fishing association!
It does not matter how many signatures you get.
Let us Do An Ofunehiki This Year!!
Association to Make the Ofunehiki A Reality The Ofunehiki is one of our historical traditions!
It was Oshiooshi that said they would not do it this year in the first place.
This is the first time Hikari's been so serious about asking you for something.
What kind of parent does it make you if you do not at least listen?
I saw them collecting signatures myself,
and they were working really hard.
The people on the surface will not listen.
There is no point in talking to them.
I thought that the guys on the surface were all pigs at first, too...
That there is no point in talking to them.
And they thought of us as fish...
We are not fish, and they are not pigs!
We are all humans that can communicate with each other!
We are really serious about this!
Please get everyone together and talk to them!
You are going to rely on me?
Then we do not need your help!
Just do not get in our way, then!
So everything went okay with the fishery cooperative?
It really was not that hard.
Even if people could not really talk about the Ofunehiki,
they seemed to be concerned about it.
My stupid dad would not listen,
but the Young Men Coalition heard me out.
If I mention that the people of the surface already agreed to it,
It is finally show time, then!
We are going to do the Ofunehiki!
If we do not hurry up and eat, there will not be any time to play.
But they are all so stubborn...
I am going to make this happen.
Oh, I mean Hii-kun is always trying really hard...
But um... this seems to be a different kind of trying hard...
I do not want to change.
I want all of us to be together forever.
We need to hurry and stop Hii-kun!
I do not think we can do that.
There are some things that change even if we do not want them to...
But once someone decides they are going to change and work really hard at it,
I do not think even the Sea God could stop them.
Wow, they did a great job on this.
I think we could actually use this.
To think that they were able to get Hikari's dad to come out, too...
I sort of want to go take a piss.
When we were kids, we made all of these little things too, did not we, Sakishima?
The four of us and our friends from the surface all worked together.
Wh-What are we going to do, Chii-chan?!
We sewed it so the left would be in front!
We can fix that in no time.
It appears that everyone is ready now.
I will be moderating the meeting today.
So, what do you all think?
The students worked really hard to make this.
So as their teacher, I would really like to see their dream come true.
Well, we never objected to doing the Ofunehiki in the first place.
And festivals should not be disregarded.
And it is not like we are going to neglect the god.
The kids went so far to do this.
A lot's happened, but why do not we let it go?
I am saying that we will listen to your apology now.
We came all the way here.
Our hearts are as wide as the sea.
It will probably be a little rude, but we will hear it out.
Why would we have to apologize?
You are the ones that said you would not do the festival in the first place.
Are you trying to say you do not remember the last Ofunehiki?
You guys were complaining about how there was not enough money
or enough people, and you asked to scale things down, did not you?
Not to mention this happened time after time...
even if we had not said we were not going to do it,
Hey, this does not look very good, does it?
you guys would have said it yourselves.
This is not a gathering to say who should apologize or who is at faul
Anyway, you are the ones who called it off first.
It is only natural that you apologize.
the reason we do not have enough people or any money
is because ya'll keep taking them from the top!
Both our fish and our women!
The reason your women run off is because you guys are not reliable, is not it?
You are going to blame us for that, too?
Looks like it is going to rain...
You are going to come, too?
I really want to show Miuna-chan an actual Ofunehiki.
Maybe it is because of our roots.
There is that, and if Miuna-chan is ever lost...
I thought it could be like a light in her heart.
All right, let us go in.
The hell are you saying, fish head?
Why do not we settle things once and for all?
You are the guy Akari's seeing!
We have got plenty of things we want to say to you!
You are adults, are not you?
Why cannot you talk things out?!
As Hikari said, because we are not fish or pigs, we can understand each other...
But it is because we can communicate,
that we realize there are differences we can never get over.
People from the sea and people from the surface will never see eye to eye.
I always... thought something was different.
I finally realize what it was.
I am talking about Itaru-san and myself.
And yet, you always change the subject to the sea and the surface.
I asked Mom a long time ago...
She said... the reason was simple.
She married you just because she loved you.
When I heard that, I was happy.
Because of that, I just happened to ask her,
what if you were from the surface.
And then Mom just smiled and said...
Even then, I would have been with your father.
I am going to be Miuna-chan's mother.
You do not need to apologize.
I know that there is no way things will be normal.
I see, so she said she is going to leave.
There is not much more time.
What are you going to do, Tomoru?
Would you consider changing your mind?
But you are still under my protection.
Thank you for everything that you have done for me.
I will live life on the surface.
I am not coming back, either.
Apparently everyone in the family is stubborn.
We must do everything we can.
No good will come of you going up to the surface.
There is someone up there who is waiting for me!
Why are you trying to stop us?!
I have to protect you both...
At this rate, we will freeze...
Like hell I am going to give up!
I do not want to be... forced into the flow anymore.
Well, well, they are definitely giving it their all.
I want a she will from the sea that I love.
I do not want you to go through the same thing, Akari.
I do not care if I cannot go back to the sea.
What is wrong with those two being together?
Episode Eight: Beyond the Wavering Feelings
